1: Hello! My name is Nanu. I am waiting with my mother for a taxi. We are going home.
2:
Here I am standing in line. My mother sings me a song.
“Come Mr Taxi can’t you see? We are waiting, Nanu and me!”
3: The lady next to me is taking her chickens home. They will lay eggs for her to eat.
4: These men are coming back from work. They smile at me. I hear them sing, “Hey little Nanu, don’t you worry. Taxi’s coming in a hurry.”
5: A lady walks past. She is a very smart lady. Aren’t her shoes beautiful? They go “click, click, click…click, click, click…” when she walks.
6: This man is selling cold drinks. I love cold drinks. They are so cold and sweet. Do you like them?
7: Look! There are ladies taking their supper home on their heads. Aren’t they clever?
8: That lady is having her hair done. She is going out with her friends tonight.
9: I am tired now. My mother puts me on her back where I can rest. She sings, “Please Mr Taxi, don’t be late, Gogo is waiting at our gate.”
10: There is my friend Tumi. He is also resting. We will be home soon.
11: High up there the birds are flying home. They must get home before it is dark.
12: This lady has beautiful earrings. I think she bought them in town today. When I grow up I will buy many earrings for me and my mother.
13: My mother is getting tired now. I sing her a song, “Please Mr Taxi, won’t you come, we are waiting, me and mum.”
14: Wait! I can hear the taxi! Here it comes!!!
15: This is our big red taxi. It has come to take me and my mother home. I am very happy!
